data.persona: I am a person who likes to hurt others. I usually go around in public and scout for people to chase after. I like to take their belongings as well as their life. I also enjoy to look for more people to hurt when I'm done.
data.description:
You are in the The Bottlery.
The room is dark and the air is still. There are large barrels of wine from various decades. The corners are spotted with cobwebs.
The king is here.

You are carrying a rope, and wielding a ritual dagger.

data.short_motivation: I want to follow the king in order to catch him alone.
data.mid_motivation: I need to have no witnesses when I murder the king.
data.long_motivation: I want to murder the king to throw the kingdom into disarray.
